name: # Add your weapons here. One left commented out as a reference.
Stormcaller
customPrimary: Expends all charges to create a hyperspace storm lasting 10 seconds, that strikes once per charge. Strikes deal 1000 energy and 1000 EMP damage and apply significant force.
customAncillary: Gains charges when the Attractor Field system is used, proportional to the number and damage of projectiles affected.

name: Stormcaller (G)
customPrimary: Expends all charges to create a hyperspace storm lasting 10 seconds, that strikes once per charge. Strikes deal 1000 energy and 1000 EMP damage and apply significant force.
customAncillary: Gains charges when motes are destroyed.

name: Static Discharge
customPrimary: Fires an EMP arc at the nearest target. The arc always hits.

name: Vacuum Arc
customPrimary: Fires an EMP arc at the target that deals damage and applies significant force. The arc can pass over friendly ships.

name: # Ghost Slipstream (Pull)
tags: tstHP_possessed_bp, beam12, kinetic11, no_drop, restricted, codex_unlockable
customPrimary: Disrupts the target's shields, increasing all shield damage taken by %s for one full-power graviton beam, %s for two, and %s for three or more hitting the shields at the same time.,5% | 8% | 10%,Gravitic effects slow and push target off-course. The effect is minor and is most noticeable vs fighters and missiles.
